# Language Guidelines

## Output Language

**All generated files must be written in English:**
- Source code (variable names, function names)
- Code comments
- Documentation (README, CLAUDE.md, etc.)
- Commit messages
- Pull request descriptions
- Configuration files (Makefile, etc.)

## Exceptions

- Localization files (i18n/l10n): Write translations in target language
- User-facing strings: Follow project's localization strategy
